title: Who is more famous, Billie Eilish or Charli Damelio? - Quora

response.answer_text: Billie Eilish is easily more famous than Charli D’Amelio. Billie first started making music with her brother at age 13 (2015) and started getting big in 2018 after the release of her song “you should see me in a crown”. She released and album in March of the next year giving her 2–1 and a half years of fame. Charli D’Amelio first got tik-tok in summer of 2019 and rose to fame with her video of the renegade dance.giving her 1 year of fame and less time to gain fans and popularity.

Well considering I had no clue who Charli was I would say Billie. But then again I don’t use TikTok. It all depends on what world you choose to live in, one ruled by Social Media or not. Some of us are just too busy in the real world to let SM take over our lives.
